mapper.insert: insert into doc_main_tb (doc_serial_no, doc_no, doc_name, doc_language, secret_level, doc_type, doc_writer, doc_desc, create_user, upload_user, upload_time, last_modi_time, doc_version, file_root_path) values (#{doc_serial_no}, #{doc_no}, #{doc_name}, #{doc_language}, #{secret_level}, #{doc_type}, #{doc_writer}, #{doc_desc}, #{create_user}, #{upload_user}, #{upload_time}, #{last_modi_time}, #{doc_version}, #{file_root_path}, )
